dc:title: Guadalupe
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: An account of her pilgrimage with her daughter to see Our Lady of Guadalupe. Speaks of the Marian devotion of both herself and Mexicans.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 31 1930-02-26 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
